name: Show_Rack_Mount_Flex_Server
action:
<*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Rack_Mount_Flex_Server,Flex Server Node Type,Node Supplier (Flex Server),TrustedPlatform_Module_TPM,Multi Window Support (Flex Server),Remote Peripheral Solution Type (RPS) - (Flex Server -Cabinet),Flex Server Rack Mounting Type,RPS Mounting Furniture (Flex Server Cabinet),Server_Location/Cluster/Network Group_desk1)*>
<*xDisallowallValuesExcept(Server_Location/Cluster/Network Group_desk1:<* LIST ( SELECT AttValue FROM ClusterAttValues WHERE CAST (AttValueCode AS float) <= '<*CTX( Container(List of Locations/Clusters/Network Groups).Rows.GetCount )*>' ) *>)*>
